snippet: Mexico's top environmental official said Tuesday that a mining company lied about a spill of millions of gallons of acids and heavy metals that contaminated two rivers and a dam downstream....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Says Mine Firm Lied About Chemical Spill
headline.main: Mexico Says Mine Firm Lied About Chemical Spill

lead_paragraph: Mexico's top environmental official said Tuesday that a mining company lied about a spill of millions of gallons of acids and heavy metals that contaminated two rivers and a dam downstream.
